description: The Respondent must provide a conveyor style x-ray machine for the purpose of screening personal baggage and parcels as well as a multi-zone walk through metal detector with at least 33 metal detection zones. Project Location: Canada.
duration_in_months: With the expected contract start and end dates being 2023-02-24 and 2024-02-23 respectively, the duration would be between 12 months.
full_summary:
# Invitation to Qualify (ITQ) for Security Screening Equipment
[Invitation à se qualifier (ISQ) - équipement de contrôle de sûreté](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15092978?extsite=MTUwOTI5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

### Tender Details
* **Reference Number:** WS3821290171-Doc3821384163
* **Amendment Number:** 1
* **Publication Date:** 2023-01-10
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-01-25T14:00:00 EST
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2023-02-24
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-02-23
* **Tender Status:** Expiré

### Contract Specifications
* **UNSPSC Code:** 41100000 (Laboratory and scientific equipment)
* ** Procurement Category:** GD (Goods)
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open bidding

### Evaluation Criteria
* Variations or combinations of the above methods

### Important Details
* Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by January 25, 2023 at 2:00 pm EST.
* All bids submitted after 2:00 pm EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Required Equipment
* Conveyor style x-ray machine for personal baggage and parcels
* Multi-zone walk-through metal detector with a minimum of 33 metal detection localization zones

### Contact Information
* Name: Lisa Golab (SPAC/PSPC)
* Email: [lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa.golab@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15092978?extsite=MTUwOTI5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15092978?extsite=MTUwOTI5NzhfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)
 
### Trade Agreements
* The tender is subject to the following trade agreements:
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic
